short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save yourself and your children from "The Internet" by blocking 350+ websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension will block any and all the porn websites you will try to open in chrome browser.  This extension is completely free.

This is helpful:
- if you are working on your health journey
- if you are trying to quit the porn addiction. 
- if you want your children to not stumble upon the evil internet accidently.

Additionaly there is an option in settings to block the social media as well. 

Try it and share your feedback.
